title: Bugsplat?
body: Sometimes (50-60%) when I open up League, during the authenticating phase, patching (your client will automatically update in 10,9,8...) and when I actually login and everything loads up with sound my client sometimes freezes and presents me with a bug splat. It's been occurring for multiple patches  (although it's been dealable as I just have to wait for 5 mins or so) and I don't know how to fix it. It seems to only occur when I start up my computer (as my computer then runs smoothly). Is there anyone else out there with the same problem or have something to suggest that would fix it?

replies.body: Sounds like it's probably connection related, are you on a wifi connection? If so I'd say that's likely your issue.
It doesn't appear to be the problem as I always use ethernet to prevent lag. It's deal-able but slightly infuriating at times.

Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

I don't know if either will help since it sounds like a connection issue but it couldbe some combination and it's strange some of the things a clean reinstall will fix.

If that still doesn't fix your issue though **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
